Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2007 10:50PM marychickpea wrote: Hi, I also have lump on side of my head and I just had test done and found that I have bone mets, the plus of feeling the lump is it is not in the brain, I too am on herceptin and they said it is killing the cancer cells. I have to have radiation treatments to the scalp and continue on the herceptin weekly and zometa once a month. Your wife is in my thoughts and prayers and we have to stay stong and fight and hope that the herceptin works, most feel that it is a miracle treatment. It's tuff but please insist that they have it checked, but she is already on the herceptin and that is truly a plus. I will be keeping positive thoughts for both of you.
Posts.Title: Lump on side of head Bradvs marychickpea
